The font of the string to draw

The position of the string to draw
The foreground colour of the string to draw
The background colour of the string to draw; default is #000000
The offset of the outlines; default is 1
The scale of the string to draw; default is (1, 1)
The rotation of the string to draw; default is 0

member.summary: The game is in multiplayer mode and the user joined a server

member.name: M:TAPI.SDK.Net.NetHelper.SendModData(System.String,System.Enum,System.Object[])
member.summary: Sends data as a managed object
member.param: The name of the mod which is sending a message
The message ID
The objects to send

member.name: M:TAPI.SDK.Net.NetHelper.SendModData(System.String,System.Enum,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Object[])
member.summary: Sends data as a managed object
member.param: The name of the mod which is sending a message
The message ID
The client ID where the message should be sent to if Main.netMode equals 2
The client ID where the message should not be sent to if Main.netMode equals 2
The objects to send

member.name: M:TAPI.SDK.Net.NetHelper.ReadObject(System.Type,TAPI.BinBuffer)
member.summary: Retrieves a managed object sent by .SendModData
member.param: The type of the sent object to read. It must have a parameterless constructor defined.
The data that is received from the network
member.returns: The data as a managed object

member.name: M:TAPI.SDK.Net.NetHelper.SendText(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a message to the chat lines. If Main.netMode equals 0, the message is sent with Main.NewText. If Main.netMode equals 1, nothing will happen. If Main.netMode equals 2, the message is sent as NetMessage 25.
member.param: The text to send

member.name: M:TAPI.SDK.Net.NetHelper.SendText(System.String,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Color)
member.summary: Sends a message to the chat lines. If Main.netMode equals 0, the message is sent with Main.NewText. If Main.netMode equals 1, nothing will happen. If Main.netMode equals 2, the message is sent as NetMessage 25.
member.param: The text to send
The colour of the text to send; default is White

member.name: T:TAPI.SDK.Net.SyncedRandom
member.summary: A synced Pseudo-Random Number Generator. Values are global.

member.name: M:TAPI.SDK.Net.SyncedRandom.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
member.param: The group name of the instance (instances of the same group name return the same results)

member.name: M:TAPI.SDK.Net.SyncedRandom.#ctor(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
member.param: The seed of the PRNG
The group name of the instance (instances of the same group name return the same results)

member.name: M:TAPI.SDK.Net.SyncedRandom.Finalize
member.summary: Disposes the SyncedRandom instance by sending a NetMessage that decreases the group reference counter on the server/other clients, decreases the group reference counter, and checks wether the group's random instance can be removed or not.

member.name: M:TAPI.SDK.Net.SyncedRandom.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the SyncedRandom instance by sending a NetMessage that decreases the group reference counter on the server/other clients, decreases the group reference counter, and checks wether the group's random instance can be removed or not.

member.name: M:TAPI.SDK.Net.SyncedRandom.Next
member.summary: Generates a nonnegative integral value
member.returns: A nonnegative integral value

member.name: M:TAPI.SDK.Net.SyncedRandom.Next(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a nonnegative integral value that is smaller than the specified maximum value
member.param: The specified maximum value
member.returns: An integral value that is equal to or greater than 0 and smaller than the specified maximum value

member.name: M:TAPI.SDK.Net.SyncedRandom.Next(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates an integral value that is equal to or bigger than the specified minimum value and smaller than the specified maximum value
member.param: The specified minimum value
The specified maximum value
member.returns: An integral value that is equal to or greater than the specified minimum value and smaller than the specified maximum value

member.name: M:TAPI.SDK.Net.SyncedRandom.NextDouble
member.summary: Returns a decimal value equal to or bigger than 0 and smaller than 1
member.returns: A decimal value

member.name: M:TAPI.SDK.Net.SyncedRandom.NextBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Fills an array of bytes with random values
member.param: The array to fill

member.name: M:TAPI.SDK.Net.SyncedRandom.Sample
member.summary: Creates a sample value equal to or bigger than 0 and smaller than 1
member.returns: A sample value

member.name: P:TAPI.SDK.Net.SyncedRandom.GroupName
member.summary: The group name of the instance

member.name: M:TAPI.SDK.World.SpawnCustomDust(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.Texture2D,System.Int32,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2,System.Nullable{Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Color},System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Spawns a custom Dust
member.param: The position of the particle
The size of the particle
The sprite of the particle
The masking type of the particle (mimic AI type)
The velocity of the particle; default is {0;0}
The colour (incl. alpha) of the particle; default is {255;255;255;0}
The scale of the particle
Wether the particle is bound to the laws of gravity or not; default is false (laws do apply)
Weter the particle can emit light or not; default is false (can emit light)
member.returns: The ID of the newly spawned Dust instance

member.summary: Spawns a custom Dust

The size of the particle
The sprite of the particle
The behaviour of the particle
The velocity of the particle; default is {0;0}
The colour (incl. alpha) of the particle; default is {255;255;255;0}
The scale of the particle
Wether the particle is bound to the laws of gravity or not; default is false (laws do apply)
Weter the particle can emit light or not; default is false (can emit light)
